mi consulta es... cree un avion con una nave encima como en la vida real xd. funciona todo bien pero cuando quiero separar las naves no logro tener el control sino que sigo controlando el avion, ya intente el boton de "controlar desde aqui" y nada

My question is... create an airplane with a ship on top like in real life xd. Everything works fine but when I want to separate the ships I can't have control but I continue controlling the plane, I already tried the "control from here" button and nothing

 

Edited January 9 by Vanamonde
Please post in English when not using the International subforums.

I'm not clear about what you're asking. After two mated ships separate you are not in control of the one you want to be controlling? Control from here should fix that, as you say. Maybe try switching with the square bracket keys ] and [? Pictures of your craft might help diagnose problems. 

Also, welcome to the forum.

Thanks google.

  

Hola. Bienvenido a bordo.


Cuando desacople, siempre estoy al mando del barco equivocado.

Utilice [ y o ] para cambiar de barco.


Si tiene un teclado y una combinación de teclas diferentes, puede consultar el menú "Configuración".

 

Hi. Welcome aboard.

 

When I undock I am always in command of the wrong vessel.

Use the  [   and or   ]    to switch vessel.

 

If you have a different keyboard and key-binding you can check the "Settings" menu.
